subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
Audio experts? You can send a sample of EVP/ITC to Sony or Panasonic  
to have it analyzed unless you wanted to seek out someone locally.  
Myself, I like to stick to big companies. I love to have Sony tell me,  
yes, there's a voice, it's measurable, it exists, but how it got there  
is anyone's guess. Tickles me pink!

What do you mean by the term "lower entity" and why would they not be  
intelligent or even brilliant (human terms)? Also, are you referring  
to my comments about the Fish Group?

w.
